participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.

participant_2.background: i'm not a good swimmer at all. i am a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i do like watching cooking shows.

content.text: hello! how are you? I am 100 years of age. what do you do?
Hello! I'm fine. Here, recently made a fresh smoothie. I think tomorrow evening we will go with friends to a Jewish restaurant. How do you? What are the plans for today?
I like to dance in my spare time. do you like wine? I do
Wow! Yes, I like wine. I even watched a couple of programs on how to do it. I love to ride a rollercoaster and go diving in the sky.
that sounds like a lot of fun. I am a very strong age. do you go to the sky?
that sounds fun. I love the moonlight. what are you studying?
Now I am studying producing. In Germany, I studied journalism. What is your education?
I am in germany. do you have any hobbies? I love wine and moonlight
